verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Wise men seeking Jesus,
Travelled from afar,
Guided on their journey
By a beauteous star.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
But if we desire him,
He is close at hand;
For our native country
Is our Holy Land.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Prayerful souls may find him
By our quiet lakes,
Meet him on the hillsides
When the morning breaks.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
In our fertile cornfields
While the sheaves are bound,
In our busy markets,
Jesus may be found.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Fishermen talk with him
By the great North Sea,
As the first disciples
Did in Galilee.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Every town and village
In our land might be
Made by Jesus' presence
Like sweet Bethany

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
He is more than near us
If we love him well;
For he seeketh ever
In our hearts to dwell.
